WorkDescription: Designed and implemented a Review & Ratings feature for the Marketplace Gallery, Website, and Developer Portal, increasing app adoption and user engagement within the marketplace.
Optimized the Marketplace Gallery performance, reducing page rendering time from 12s to 5s, resulting in a 58% faster load time, significantly improving user experience and retention rates.

Led a PoC for 'Meta Framework' integration in Freshworks Developer Kit (FDK), enabling seamless framework support and out-of-the-box compatibility with third-party libraries and many more, enhancing the developer experience and reducing onboarding efforts.

Actively contributed to the Freshworks developer community, assisting external developers with FDK app development, troubleshooting, and best practices, fostering stronger developer engagement and adoption.
Led the migration of the Marketplace Gallery from Vue 2 to Vue 3, improving performance, maintainability, and compatibility with modern tools.

Designed and built 'App Referee,' an internal tool that streamlined app review processes by enabling reviewers to efficiently assess content, code, pricing, and compliance. Integrated into the Freshdesk product, it enhanced review accuracy and reduced turnaround time significantly.

Conducted a PoC to migrate the unit test framework from Jest to Vitest for the Marketplace Gallery and website, resulting in faster test execution, improved developer experience, and better TypeScript support. Successfully boosted code coverage from 60% to 97%.
Contributed to Freshworks Crayons, an open-source UI framework.
Continued working on the same project and became part of a team focused on building reusable components that could be easily plugged into the main application.
Built and maintained reusable UI components such as tables, toast notifications, search bars, and more, ensuring consistency and ease of use across the application.
Started by fixing bugs and handling small tasks to get familiar with the project and codebase.
Contributed to building the insurance product from scratch using React.js
Took full ownership of the quote creation and update flow, implementing the end-to-end experience for generating and modifying insurance quotes.

CodingSkills.Heading: Tech Stacks and Tools
CodingSkills.HeadingDescription: Programming languages and tools that I know and usually used when making a project.
